name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 16: Neko no Kaikata: Sekai no Neko Catalog
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.15 - Neko no Kaikata is the 15th game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user to learn about the different cats breeds, with lot of information in a complete database featuring movies and photographs of the different breeds. The game features also a quiz mode.
